Data: Consistency Check & Execute Layer Error during Quick Test
This test case is to check if the consistency check is done properly before performing a quick test or starting the test execution

Action: 1. Add a PluginName (01) Plugin using the Add Modules button
Expected Result:
1. The PluginName (01)  plugin will be added.
2. By default the interface page will be shown and the Device IP will be empty.

Action:
1. Switch to Channels Page
2. Uncheck the Enable Output in Output Settings
3. Uncheck the Select All in Input Settings

1. Switch to Test Page
2. Click "Test" button
Expected Result:
A message popup will appear with the message,
"Configure a Valid Device IP Address
Activate atleast one channel"

Action:
1. Switch to Channels Page
2. Enable the Output Channel
3. Switch to Test Page
4. Click "Test" button
Expected Result:
A message popup will appear with the message,
"Configure a Valid Device IP Address"

Action:
1. Switch to Interface Page
2. Set Device IP as 10.81.3.128 (Dummy IP Address)
3. Switch to Test Page
4. Click "Test" button
Expected Result: 1. Quick Test will be performed and Execute layer error will be displayed in the Status bar since there is no real hardware.
